Apple Computer EFI Unlocker

Unlock 4 digit numerical (and possibly iCloud) passwords on your OSX computer.


Stuck on this screen? Don't know the password?


EFI Unlocker will brute force the password for you, giving you access to OSX Recovery Utilities


Features

➲ 25 Guesses/ minute. EFI Unlocker will take a maximum of 6 hours to unlock your computer

➲ Compared our speed to existing products; Blackbox+ can take up to 3 days to unlock!

➲ Does not void your Apple Warranty (since you aren't making changes to internal hardware)

➲ Does not require any specialized software or batteries, only a working USB port on your Apple Laptop or Desktop

➲ Works for all Apple Laptop/ Desktop models as long as your EFI password is 4 digit numerical

➲ Open Source and Open Hardware (code and schematics coming soon)

Instructions

Add video here...

1. Go to EFI lock screen (Hold Apple + R keys during system boot)

2. Connect EFI Unlocker to computer via USB

3. Stare at is blankly as it begins guessing passwords. That, or go have a cup of tea and wait for it to finish

4. Additionally, use a camera to record the process. This way you can see what the code is when it unlocks your computer
